name: Softr
tagline: Build web and mobile apps from Notion databases without code
description: Softr transforms your Notion databases into fully functional web and mobile applications with professional UI components, user authentication, and payment integration. Create client portals, directories, membership sites, and custom apps without writing code.
topBenefits: Turn Notion databases into web/mobile apps

rawData.description: Softr is a no-code platform for building custom web and mobile apps from Notion databases. Create professional client portals, membership sites, directories, and internal tools using pre-built blocks and templates. Connect your Notion workspace and transform your data into powerful applications with user authentication, payments, and advanced permissions.

enhancedContent.overview:
Softr empowers Notion users to transform their databases into fully functional web and mobile applications without writing a single line of code. This no-code platform bridges the gap between data management and application development by directly connecting to your Notion workspace and converting your structured information into professional, interactive apps. Whether you're managing client relationships, building member communities, or organizing product catalogs in Notion, Softr provides the tools to turn that data into polished applications.

The platform works by establishing a real-time connection with your Notion databases, allowing you to select which data to display and how to present it using an extensive library of customizable interface components. You can create everything from password-protected client portals to public-facing directories, complete with user authentication, payment processing, and sophisticated permission controls. The beauty lies in maintaining your existing Notion workflow while extending its capabilities through a user-friendly application layer.

For Notion power users who've outgrown basic database sharing, Softr delivers the ability to create professional applications that respect your data structure while providing enhanced functionality. Your Notion workspace remains the content management hub, while Softr handles the complex application logic, responsive design, and user experience optimization that transforms raw data into engaging digital experiences.
problemsSolved: Notion databases are powerful for internal use but lack the polish and functionality needed for external sharing with clients or customers
Creating professional client portals or member sites typically requires expensive development resources and technical expertise
Notion's basic sharing options don't provide user authentication, payment integration, or advanced permission management
solutionsBenefits: Transform existing Notion databases into professional applications with custom branding, SSL security, and responsive design
Launch client-facing applications in hours instead of months, using pre-built components and templates that require no coding knowledge
Implement sophisticated user access controls, payment systems, and interactive features while keeping Notion as your data management foundation
idealFor: Consultants and agencies managing client projects in Notion who need professional client portals
Community builders and course creators using Notion for content who want member directories and learning platforms
Small businesses with Notion-based product catalogs or service directories seeking e-commerce functionality
notRecommendedFor: Users needing highly complex custom functionality that requires extensive custom development
Organizations with strict data security requirements that prevent third-party database connections

faqs.question: How does this integrate with Notion?
faqs.answer: Softr connects directly to your Notion workspace through an authorized API connection. You simply authenticate your Notion account, select which databases to use, and Softr automatically syncs the data in real-time. Any changes you make in Notion are immediately reflected in your Softr application.

faqs.question: What's the setup time?
faqs.answer: Most users can create a basic application within 30-60 minutes. The initial Notion connection takes just a few minutes, and using pre-built templates can have you up and running quickly. More complex applications with custom styling and advanced features typically take a few hours to configure properly.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Softr offers a free tier that allows you to build and test applications with basic features. Paid plans start at reasonable monthly rates and unlock advanced features like custom domains, payment integration, removing Softr branding, and increased usage limits.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases for Notion users?
faqs.answer: Popular applications include client portals connected to Notion CRM databases, member directories for communities, course platforms using Notion as the content backend, internal company tools and dashboards, and product catalogs or service marketplaces with integrated payments.
